page.title: 19Visiting Grandpa & Granny's
page.content: On{Sunday}morning we do not get up early, but when we do get up we go downstairs and help cook the breakfast. After{breakfast}we have a wash and then we get dressed. Then we tidy up our rooms. At 11.30 we get into the car and drive to West Horsely where we pick up my {Great Grandmother}and then we drive to East Horsely where we go to my{Grandpa and{Granny's}for the day. For{lunch}we would have a roast. After lunch my Great Grandmother goes upstairs and has a rest. While she is resting we do the washing up and then we sit in the lounge and{read.}Then when my Great Grandmother comes down she has a cup of tea and I play{cards with her. At about 5.30 we make{tea. After tea we switch the{television}on. At 6.30 we go home.I (Jenny Laverack) enjoy our weekends. {
